text: Reginald Pearce (20 April 1918 - 19 June 1995) was an Australian cricketer. He played three first-class matches for New South Wales in 1952/53. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1918 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers
title: Reginald Pearce
